text: Yetheparyanta ki jevha amaca adesa ye'una pohocala ani tanduramadhuna pani ucambalu lagale, amhi sangitale ki ya nauketa pratyeka prakaracya (nara va mada asa) jodya svara karuna ghya ani apalya kutumbiyannahi, matra tyancyakherija jyancyabaddala adhica phaisala jhalela ahe ani sarva imana rakhanaryannahi. Thyancyasobata imana rakhanare pharaca kami hote
